text:
A problem with 1.2RC2 on Windows 2000:

Epoz displays the whole pages as a "normal" text. Tags for headlines etc. are 
not shown.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: The problem also occurs on SuSE Linux 8.2 with Mozilla 1.2.1
can you try again with latest cvs and epoz 1.0.2?
creator: gregor@apache.org
